titles.title: To enact title 54, United States Code, "National Park System", as positive law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 9/22/2010--Introduced. Enacts title 54 of the United States Code into positive law to be entitled "National Park System." Makes conforming changes to existing law and repeals specified provisions of specified laws.
